meanings.definition: A small, pale soft-bodied insect that lives in large colonies with several different castes, typically within a mound of cemented earth.
meanings.sent1: The termite scurried quickly across the ground.
meanings.sent2: My house had to be treated for termites last year.
meanings.sent3: The termite threw a tiny party in its underground home.
meanings.sent4: The termites of procrastination slowly eat away at my productivity.
meanings.sent5: I could hear the tiny termite munching on the wooden beam.

meanings.definition: A member of a group of social insects that feed on wood and can cause extensive damage to wooden structures.
meanings.sent1: Be careful, a termite might be hiding in that old furniture.
meanings.sent2: The termite infestation led to costly repairs.
meanings.sent3: The termite invited all its friends to a feast on my bookshelf.
meanings.sent4: The termites of doubt slowly eat away at my confidence.
meanings.sent5: The termite's appetite for destruction knows no bounds.
